summary: PerkUP! - A comprehensive that adds tons of new perks, more perk ranks (10 ranks for every perk) and lots of perk fixes included, all rolled into a modular and powerful perk pack!
descriptionHtml:
PerkUP! ~Ultimate Perk Mod~

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9359

Nexus Mod Manager Compatible!

Version 17

**CHECK OUT THE PERKS LIST FOR ALL THE NEW PERKS!**
NEW: Dragon Slayer, Giant Slayer, Creature Killer, Vampire Hunter....lots more!
---> These \"slayer\" perks work with ANY weapon, including fists and have no skill requirements to learn. They are located under \"Two-Handed\" just because I needed someplace to put them. You do not need to level Two-Handed to get them.<---

NEW: Left and Right handed weapon speed perk, Heavy Weapon speed perk!!
NEW: Sword perk, Axe perk, Mace perk, Dagger perk, Warhammer perk, Greatsword perk, Battleaxe perk!!!
NEW: Speech perks that allow you to take on more specific jobs (Miner, Hunter, Arms Merchant)!
NEW: Unarmed damage and unarmed critical perks!! Punch dragons in the face and laugh!
NEW: +Movement speed perk (under light armor) and MAGE ARMOR ranks.
NEW: Smelting perk added to melt down ores.
NEW: Two-handed sneak perk, Archery armor piercing, bleed and dragon take-down perks.
NEW: Unarmored (no armor) perks added to Light armor tree.
NEW: Magic-enchancing staff perks for all magic trees!
NEW: Spellsword perks, One-handed sweep perk!
NEW: KNOCKBACK perks for onehanded and twohanded!
NEW: Voice perk added to Speech tree, shout more!

**PLEASE ENDORSE IF YOU USE PERKUP, THANK YOU**

===========================
By: Slayerjerman
===========================

1) MOD DESCRIPTION
2) PERKUP - MAIN PLUGINS
3) PERKUP - OPTIONAL PLUGINS
4) ISSUES
5) COMPATIBLITY WITH OTHER MODS
6) INSTALL
7) LOAD ORDER
8) RECOMMENDED MODS TO USE WITH PPE
9) LEGAL
10) TOOLS USED

===========================
01: MOD DESCRIPTION
===========================

Tired of the same, boring old perks? Want to be more powerful or specialize? Don\'t know which of the many perk mods to download?

PerkUP! - A comprehensive that adds tons of new perks, more perk ranks (10 ranks for every perk) and lots of perk fixes included, all rolled into a modular and powerful perk pack!

--> NO perk requires higher than 100 in any skill. This keeps it balanced and less \"grindy\".

--> ALL perks are balanced and based of vanilla values. This mod will not give you +99999 to weapons or make you a smithing/enchanting/alchemy god.

--> Added 70+ new perks. Including DragonSlayer, Unarmed perks, weapon speed perks, weapon specialization perks and more!!!

--> Specialized perks for mages in EACH school of magic! Better mage armor, more mana regen perks.

--> Some perks now require you to invest more points for specialization and improving abilities. This MAY make some perks feel \"too difficult\". I do take requests if you feel a perk is too hard or feels too useless and I will attempt to revise it.

===========================
02: PERKUP MAIN FILES
===========================

Each skill tree is being divided into its own stand-alone ESP so you can pick and choose from. You can use one or all of them if you wish. 

Files in v17:
=========================
PerkUP-Alchemy.esp
PerkUP-Alteration.esp
PerkUP-Archery.esp
PerkUP-Block.esp
PerkUP-Conjuration.esp
PerkUP-Destruction.esp
PerkUP-Enchanting.esp
PerkUP-HeavyArmor.esp
PerkUP-Illusion.esp
PerkUP-LightArmor.esp
PerkUP-Lockpicking.esp
PerkUP-OneHanded.esp
PerkUP-Pickpocket.esp
PerkUP-Restoration.esp
PerkUP-Smithing.esp
PerkUP-Sneak.esp
PerkUP-Speech.esp
PerkUP-TwoHanded.esp

===========================
03: PERKUP OPTIONAL PLUGINS
===========================

PerkUP-zOptional_HeavyArmor_NoHelmsReq.esp
PerkUP-zOptional_LightArmor_NoHelmsReq.esp
PerkUP-zOptional-Pickpocket_CarryMore100.esp


===========================
04: FIXES/OTHER MODS INCLUDED
===========================

Included fixes in PERKUP, you do not need these separately as they are built right in! 
Credit goes to the mod authors listed below for each mod, I simply included their changes in PerkUp!

*FIXES for Skyrim patch 1.5 smithing gain rate.
*Powerful Perks Expanded - PPE by Slayerjerman (my old mod which PerkUp is based on)
*Smithing Mastery Perks by darkknight098 AKA --Reaper
*Smithing Perks Overhaul by Headbomb
*Extra Effect Perk-Additional Rank by thedemoninside
*No Perk Prerequisites by ClassicalNoodle
*No Helmets Required by ClassicalNoodle
*Deflect Arrows Perk Fix by JeffSteel
*Uncapped Perks by Liberta (perks balanced and capped at 10 ranks, not 16).
*Caos Advanced Perk Ranks by CaoMengde777 (fixed bugs, naturally)
*Caos Extra Pockets Perk Upgrades by CaoMengde777
*Dead Aim perk x5 x10 x15 x20 by evi002 (rebalanced)
*Better archery Eagle Eye perk by Graxster
*Concentrated Poisons by kenevir1991
*Bugfix - Critical Charge with swords by Kevin Kidder


===========================
05: ISSUES
===========================

**Report all bugs!**

**If you are having problems with PerkUP, PM me your problem and load order**

===========================
06: COMPATIBLITY WITH OTHER MODS
===========================

*PerkUP will conflict with other mods that alter perks, your best bet is to load PPE at the end of your load order. If you want another perk-mod to overwrite a change in PPE, load that mod after PPE.

*PerkUP is OKAY with mods that ADD NEW weapons, armor, items, UI, textures or spells!!

*PerkUP will conflict with other mods that alter perk-related spell entries

===========================
07: INSTALL/UNINSTALL
===========================

!!!WARNING!!!
It is highly recommended that you use PerkUP with a NEW SAVE game. Remember to back up all your save games BEFORE using PerkUP because it changes ALOT of perk data.

This mod WILL work with current saved game also, but back up your saves!
!!!WARNING!!!


Place ESP files in your SKYRIM\\DATA\\ folder. 
Activate them with NexusModManager(NMM).


===========================
08: LOAD ORDER
===========================

SKRIM.ESM
UPDATE.ESM
--> all other mods <---
PerkUP-Alchemy.esp
PerkUP-Alteration.esp
PerkUP-Archery.esp
PerkUP-Block.esp
PerkUP-Conjuration.esp
PerkUP-Destruction.esp
PerkUP-Enchanting.esp
PerkUP-HeavyArmor.esp
PerkUP-Illusion.esp
PerkUP-LightArmor.esp
PerkUP-Lockpicking.esp
PerkUP-OneHanded.esp
PerkUP-Pickpocket.esp
PerkUP-Restoration.esp
PerkUP-Smithing.esp
PerkUP-Sneak.esp
PerkUP-Speech.esp
PerkUP-TwoHanded.esp

--> OPTIONAL ESPS <---
PerkUP-zOptional_HeavyArmor_NoHelmsReq.esp
PerkUP-zOptional_LightArmor_NoHelmsReq.esp
PerkUP-zOptional-Pickpocket_CarryMore100.esp

-->COMPATIBLITY PATCHES LAST <--
More Craftables - PerkUP compatibility.esp (from More Craftables mod)


To uninstall, deactivate the mod ESP files in NMM and delete the ESP files. Revert your save game if you backed it up.

===========================
09: RECOMMENDED MODS TO USE WITH PERKUP
===========================

Because PerkUP! requires you to spend more perk points (and can make you a badass), I highly recommend using:

Skyrim -Elys- Uncapper by Elys
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1175

Perk Point Potion by _DTG_
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10836

Deadly Dragons by 3JIou
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3829

Intense Difficulty by Pluto
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4406

Deadly Combat by Borgut1337
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5485

More Craftables by AeonVita
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=799

Tytanis - The Ultimate Mod - Crafts - Spells - Items - MORE by Tytanis
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1601


===========================
10: LEGAL
===========================

Thanks to Bethesda for a great game!

and thanks to HellLizard for all the testing work he\'s done!

**Feel free to mod, edit, fix, distribute this mod, please give me credit where credit is due if you use it!** Thanks!

===========================
11: Tools used
===========================

Nexus Mod Manager
SkyEdit v005a
SkyEdit v006a
Creation Kit
Steam
Spotify (for muzak :)
TESSNIP
Notepad
Windows Calculator
Excel
~The Internet~
author: Slayerjerman
